title: AMS Analyst - Data Services & Integrations
content:
BE PART OF BUILDING THE FUTURE.
What do NASA and emerging space companies have in common with COVID vaccine R&D teams or with Roblox and the Metaverse? 
The answer is data, -- all fast moving, fast growing industries rely on data for a competitive edge in their industries. And the most advanced companies are realizing the full data advantage by partnering with Pure Storage. Pure’s vision is to redefine the storage experience and empower innovators by simplifying how people consume and interact with data. With 11,000+ customers including 58% of the Fortune 500, we’ve only scratched the surface of our ambitions. 
Pure is blazing trails and setting records:
For ten straight years, Gartner has named Pure a leader in the Magic Quadrant 
Our customer-first culture and unwavering commitment to innovation have earned us a certified Net Promoter Score in the top 1% of B2B companies globally
Industry analysts and press applaud Pure’s leadership across these dimensions
And, our 5,000+ employees are emboldened to make Pure a faster, stronger, smarter company as we go
If you, like us, say “bring it on” to exciting challenges that change the world, we have endless opportunities where you can make your mark.Overview
Seeking an application support and maintenance specialist to join our global AMS support team. This role will have a heavy focus on the Data Services and Integrations area of the business. The person in this role will report to the AMS Manager with an internal stakeholder relationship with Data and Analytics. The AMS team is responsible for supporting end users for our core business applications while working with development teams on break fixes/bugs, configuration changes, and system/job monitoring. The Data and Analytics team are responsible for the design, development and expansion of data assets that support business intelligence, advanced analytics, and reporting.
What You’ll Do
The core objectives of this position are:
Advocate for the end user by providing a delightful and efficient user experience through professional, proactive communication, regular updates, and timely resolution of issues.
A troubleshoot and analyze reported issues to resolution or escalation with root cause analysis. 
Proactively highlight and address trending issues or suggest necessary enhancements or configuration changes.
Adequately test solutions to ensure end user adoption and smooth release transition.
Develop and articulate solution options that incorporate user experience, scalability, security and best practices.
Ensure the integrity of data, analytic applications, and integration systems, primarily but not limited to Snowflake, Boomi, Snaplogic,and AWS Cloud Services. 
Communication with internal team members and stakeholders in other time zones for requirements clarification and progress reporting.
Maintain optimal data pipeline architecture, monitoring large, complex, data sets required to meet functional and non-functional business requirements.
Additional objectives of this position are:
Maintain and optimize data tools for analytics and data scientist team members and assist them in building and improving our product into an innovative industry leader.
Responsible for coaching other junior members of the team on their analytical process and deliverables..
Work with data, analytics, and integration experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems.
Requirements
Excellent verbal and written communication skills including the ability to author and present materials ranging from detailed technical specifications to high-level presentations.
A drive to take ownership of reported issues and see them through to resolution.
Experience with a global support structure stretching over multiple time zones and cultural differences. 
Possess a love for problem solving using excellent analytical and critical thinking skills with an ability to learn quickly.
3+ years of support experience for data management and integrations including root cause analysis, end user communications, and resolution management required.
Experience with Snaplogic, Snowflake, and Boomi required.
Experience with AWS cloud applications desired.
Experience with big data tools like Spark desired.
Experience with AWS cloud services: Aurora, Redshift desired.
Experience with stream-processing systems: Storm, Spark-Streaming, Kafka etc. desired.
Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools: Azkaban, Luigi, Airflow, etc. desired.
Experience maintaining data pipelines using tools such as SQL, Python, etc.
Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.
BE YOU—CORPORATE CLONES NEED NOT APPLY.
Pure is where you ask big questions, think differently, and make an impact. This is not just a job, but a place where you have a voice and can accelerate your career. We value unique thoughts and celebrate individuality, and with ample opportunity to learn, develop yourself, and expand into different roles, joining Pure is an investment in your career journey.
Through our Pure Equality program, which supports a flourishing field of employee resource groups, we nourish the personal and professional lives of our team members. And our Pure Good Foundation gives back to local and global communities through volunteering and grants.
And because we understand the value of bringing your full and best self to work, we offer a variety of perks to manage a healthy balance, including flexible time off, wellness resources, and company-sponsored team events.
PURE IS COMMITTED TO EQUALITY.
Research shows that in order to apply for a job, women feel they need to meet 100% of the criteria while men usually apply after meeting about 60%. Regardless of how you identify, if you believe you can do the job and are a good match, we encourage you to apply.
Pure is proud to be an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, transgender status, sexual stereotypes, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or any other characteristic legally protected by the laws of the jurisdiction in which you are being considered for hire. 
If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, you may contact us at TA-Ops@purestorage.com.
